item.title: The right colors for your VIM
item.description: I have a lot of Vim colorschemes, and I like to change them very often, reflecting my mood. I needed a way to showcase them all and quickly pick one. The original Vim Color Scheme Test script by maverick.woo is written in Perl and the build works on Windows systems. I wanted to add some new features, and to test it with my own colorschemes, but as I’m not very confident with Perl, I preferred to start over with a new Ruby version instead of forking his project.
